subject: Football
Cable Television
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The chances of Rutgers fans in the New York-New Jersey area watching the Scarlet Knights play Kansas State in the Texas Bowl on Dec. 28 are dimming.
